snippet: Patrick J. Foye had intended to step down as executive director at the end of March, but he was persuaded to stay until a new chief executive is picked.
abstract: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey has persuaded executive director Patrick J Foye to continue on at his post until search for new chief executive is ended; Foye had intended to step down at end of March.
lead_paragraph: Patrick J. Foye had intended to step down as executive director at the end of March, but he was persuaded to stay until a new chief executive is picked.

headline.main: Port Authority Chief to Remain as Search for a Successor Continues
headline.print_headline: Port Authority Chief to Stay On as Search for a Successor Continues

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
